verses.verse: וַתֵּצֵ֤א <WH3318> went out דִינָה֙ <WH1783> And Dinah בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter לֵאָ֔ה <WH3812> of Leah אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom יָלְדָ֖ה <WH3205> which she bare לְיַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> unto Jacob לִרְא֖וֹת <WH7200> to see בִּבְנ֥וֹת <WH1323> the daughters הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the land

וַיַּ֨רְא <WH7200> saw אֹתָ֜הּ <WH853> שְׁכֶ֧ם <WH7927> And when Shechem בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חֲמ֛וֹר <WH2544> of Hamor הַֽחִוִּ֖י <WH2340> the Hivite נְשִׂ֣יא <WH5387> prince הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the country וַיִּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> her he took אֹתָ֛הּ <WH853> וַיִּשְׁכַּ֥ב <WH7901> her and lay אֹתָ֖הּ <WH854> her by וַיְעַנֶּֽהָ׃ <WH6031> with her and defiled her

וַתִּדְבַּ֣ק <WH1692> clave נַפְשׁ֔וֹ <WH5315> And his soul בְּדִינָ֖ה <WH1783> unto Dinah בַּֽת־ <WH1323> the daughter יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> of Jacob וַיֶּֽאֱהַב֙ <WH157> and he loved אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽנַּעֲרָ֔ <WH5291> the damsel וַיְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> and spake עַל־ <WH5921> and לֵ֥ב <WH3820> kindly הַֽנַּעֲרָֽ׃ <WH5291> unto the damsel

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> spake שְׁכֶ֔ם <WH7927> And Shechem אֶל־ <WH413> about חֲמ֥וֹר <WH2544> Hamor אָבִ֖יו <WH1> unto his father לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying קַֽח־ <WH3947> Get לִ֛י אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּלְדָּ֥ה <WH3207> me this damsel הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> for לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> to wife

וְיַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> And Jacob שָׁמַ֗ע <WH8085> heard כִּ֤י <WH3588> for טִמֵּא֙ <WH2930> that he had defiled אֶת־ <WH853> דִּינָ֣ה <WH1783> Dinah בִתּ֔וֹ <WH1323> his daughter וּבָנָ֛יו <WH1121> now his sons הָי֥וּ <WH1961> become אֶת־ <WH854> were with מִקְנֵ֖הוּ <WH4735> were with his cattle בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> in the field וְהֶחֱרִ֥שׁ <WH2790> held his peace יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> and Jacob עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּאָֽם׃ <WH935> until they were come

וַיֵּצֵ֛א <WH3318> went out חֲמ֥וֹר <WH2544> And Hamor אֲבִֽי־ <WH1> the father שְׁכֶ֖ם <WH7927> of Shechem אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> unto Jacob לְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> to commune אִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH854> with

וּבְנֵ֨י <WH1121> And the sons יַעֲקֹ֜ב <WH3290> of Jacob בָּ֤אוּ <WH935> came מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> out of the field כְּשָׁמְעָ֔ם <WH8085> when they heard וַיִּֽתְעַצְּבוּ֙ <WH6087> were grieved הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> and the men וַיִּ֥חַר <WH2734> wroth לָהֶ֖ם מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> and they were very כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because נְבָלָ֞ה <WH5039> folly עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> because he had wrought בְיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> in Israel לִשְׁכַּב֙ <WH7901> in lying אֶת־ <WH854> for בַּֽת־ <WH1323> daughter יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> with Jacob's וְכֵ֖ן <WH3651> such לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יֵעָשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> which thing ought not to be done

וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> communed חֲמ֖וֹר <WH2544> And Hamor אִתָּ֣ם <WH854> for לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> with them saying שְׁכֶ֣ם <WH7927> Shechem בְּנִ֗י <WH1121> of my son חָֽשְׁקָ֤ה <WH2836> longeth נַפְשׁוֹ֙ <WH5315> The soul בְּבִתְּכֶ֔ם <WH1323> for your daughter תְּנ֨וּ <WH5414> I pray you give נָ֥א <WH4994> please אֹתָ֛הּ <WH853> ל֖וֹ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> her him to wife

וְהִֽתְחַתְּנ֖וּ <WH2859> And make ye marriages אֹתָ֑נוּ <WH854> for בְּנֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <WH1323> your daughters תִּתְּנוּ־ <WH5414> with us [and] give לָ֔נוּ וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֹתֵ֖ינוּ <WH1323> our daughters תִּקְח֥וּ <WH3947> unto us and take לָכֶֽם׃

וְאִתָּ֖נוּ <WH854> for תֵּשֵׁ֑בוּ <WH3427> And ye shall dwell וְהָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> with us and the land תִּהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> shall be לִפְנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6440> before you שְׁבוּ֙ <WH3427> dwell וּסְחָר֔וּהָ <WH5503> and trade וְהֵֽאָחֲז֖וּ <WH270> ye therein and get you possessions בָּֽהּ׃

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said שְׁכֶם֙ <WH7927> And Shechem אֶל־ <WH413> to her אָבִ֣יה <WH1> unto her father וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to אַחֶ֔יהָ <WH251> and unto her brethren אֶמְצָא־ <WH4672> Let me find חֵ֖ן <WH2580> grace בְּעֵינֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5869> in your eyes וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whatever תֹּאמְר֛וּ <WH559> and what ye shall say אֵלַ֖י <WH413> then אֶתֵּֽן׃ <WH5414> unto me I will give

הַרְבּ֨וּ <WH7235> Ask עָלַ֤י <WH5921> ever מְאֹד֙ <WH3966> me never so much מֹ֣הַר <WH4119> dowry וּמַתָּ֔ן <WH4976> and gift וְאֶ֨תְּנָ֔ה <WH5414> and I will give כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after תֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> according as ye shall say אֵלָ֑י <WH413> to me וּתְנוּ־ <WH5414> unto me but give לִ֥י אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽנַּעֲרָ֖ <WH5291> me the damsel לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> to wife

וַיַּעֲנ֨וּ <WH6030> answered בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the sons יַעֲקֹ֜ב <WH3290> of Jacob אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁכֶ֨ם <WH7927> Shechem וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֲמ֥וֹר <WH2544> and Hamor אָבִ֛יו <WH1> his father בְּמִרְמָ֖ה <WH4820> deceitfully וַיְדַבֵּ֑רוּ <WH1696> and said אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> because טִמֵּ֔א <WH2930> because he had defiled אֵ֖ת <WH853> דִּינָ֥ה <WH1783> Dinah אֲחֹתָֽם׃ <WH269> their sister

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> And they said אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> about לֹ֤א <WH3808> not נוּכַל֙ <WH3201> be able לַעֲשׂוֹת֙ <WH6213> do הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this לָתֵת֙ <WH5414> to give אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחֹתֵ֔נוּ <WH269> our sister לְאִ֖ישׁ <WH582> another אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who ל֣וֹ עָרְלָ֑ה <WH6190> that is uncircumcised כִּֽי־ <WH3588> would be a חֶרְפָּ֥ה <WH2781> for that [were] a reproach הִ֖וא <WH1931> he לָֽנוּ׃

אַךְ־ <WH389> Only בְּזֹ֖את <WH2063> But in this נֵא֣וֹת <WH225> will we consent לָכֶ֑ם אִ֚ם <WH518> if תִּהְי֣וּ <WH1961> will become כָמֹ֔נוּ <WH3644> like לְהִמֹּ֥ל <WH4135> of you be circumcised לָכֶ֖ם כָּל־ <WH3605> every זָכָֽר׃ <WH2145> unto you If ye will be as we [be] that every male

וְנָתַ֤נּוּ <WH5414> Then will we give אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֹתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH1323> our daughters לָכֶ֔ם וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1323> your daughters נִֽקַּֽח־ <WH3947> unto you and we will take לָ֑נוּ וְיָשַׁ֣בְנוּ <WH3427> to us and we will dwell אִתְּכֶ֔ם <WH854> for וְהָיִ֖ינוּ <WH1961> and become לְעַ֥ם <WH5971> people אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> with you and we will become one

וְאִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֧א <WH3808> you will not תִשְׁמְע֛וּ <WH8085> But if ye will not hearken אֵלֵ֖ינוּ <WH413> to us לְהִמּ֑וֹל <WH4135> unto us to be circumcised וְלָקַ֥חְנוּ <WH3947> then will we take אֶת־ <WH853> בִּתֵּ֖נוּ <WH1323> our daughter וְהָלָֽכְנוּ׃ <WH1980> and we will be gone

וַיִּֽיטְב֥וּ <WH3190> seemed דִבְרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1697> And their words בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> affliction חֲמ֑וֹר <WH2544> Hamor וּבְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> affliction שְׁכֶ֥ם <WH7927> and Shechem בֶּן־ <WH1121> son חֲמֽוֹר׃ <WH2544> Hamor's

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not אֵחַ֤ר <WH309> deferred הַנַּ֙עַר֙ <WH5288> And the young man לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> not to do הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> the thing כִּ֥י <WH3588> because חָפֵ֖ץ <WH2654> because he had delight בְּבַֽת־ <WH1323> daughter יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> in Jacob's וְה֣וּא <WH1931> he נִכְבָּ֔ד <WH3513> and he [was] more honourable מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> than all the house אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> of his father

וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> came חֲמ֛וֹר <WH2544> And Hamor וּשְׁכֶ֥ם <WH7927> and Shechem בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son אֶל־ <WH413> to שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> unto the gate עִירָ֑ם <WH5892> of their city וַֽיְדַבְּר֛וּ <WH1696> and communed אֶל־ <WH413> with אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH582> with the men עִירָ֖ם <WH5892> of their city לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

הָאֲנָשִׁ֨ים <WH376> men הָאֵ֜לֶּה <WH428> These שְֽׁלֵמִ֧ים <WH8003> [are] peaceable הֵ֣ם <WH1992> like אִתָּ֗נוּ <WH854> with וְיֵשְׁב֤וּ <WH3427> us therefore let them dwell בָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> in the land וְיִסְחֲר֣וּ <WH5503> and trade אֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> וְהָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> therein for the land הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold רַֽחֲבַת־ <WH7342> behold [it is] large יָדַ֖יִם <WH3027> enough לִפְנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> for them אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֹתָם֙ <WH1323> their daughters נִקַּֽח־ <WH3947> let us take לָ֣נוּ לְנָשִׁ֔ים <WH802> to us for wives וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֹתֵ֖ינוּ <WH1323> them our daughters נִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> and let us give לָהֶֽם׃

אַךְ־ <WH389> Only בְּ֠זֹאת <WH2063> Only herein יֵאֹ֨תוּ <WH225> consent לָ֤נוּ הָאֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH376> will the men לָשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> unto us for to dwell אִתָּ֔נוּ <WH854> for לִהְי֖וֹת <WH1961> to become לְעַ֣ם <WH5971> people אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> with us to be one בְּהִמּ֥וֹל <WH4135> among us be circumcised לָ֙נוּ֙ כָּל־ <WH3605> every זָכָ֔ר <WH2145> if every male כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after הֵ֥ם <WH1992> as they נִמֹּלִֽים׃ <WH4135> as they [are] circumcised

מִקְנֵהֶ֤ם <WH4735> [Shall] not their cattle וְקִנְיָנָם֙ <WH7075> and their substance וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all בְּהֶמְתָּ֔ם <WH929> and every beast הֲל֥וֹא <WH3808> not לָ֖נוּ הֵ֑ם <WH1992> like אַ֚ךְ <WH389> Only נֵא֣וֹתָה <WH225> of theirs [be] ours? only let us consent לָהֶ֔ם וְיֵשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> unto them and they will dwell אִתָּֽנוּ׃ <WH854> for

וַיִּשְׁמְע֤וּ <WH8085> hearkened אֶל־ <WH413> to חֲמוֹר֙ <WH2544> And unto Hamor וְאֶל־ <WH413> about שְׁכֶ֣ם <WH7927> and unto Shechem בְּנ֔וֹ <WH1121> his son כָּל־ <WH3605> All יֹצְאֵ֖י <WH3318> all that went out שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> of the gate עִיר֑וֹ <WH5892> of his city וַיִּמֹּ֙לוּ֙ <WH4135> was circumcised כָּל־ <WH3605> and every זָכָ֔ר <WH2145> and every male כָּל־ <WH3605> all יֹצְאֵ֖י <WH3318> all that went out שַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> of the gate עִירֽוֹ׃ <WH5892> of his city

וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> came בַיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֜י <WH7992> And it came to pass on the third בִּֽהְיוֹתָ֣ם <WH1961> came כֹּֽאֲבִ֗ים <WH3510> when they were sore וַיִּקְח֣וּ <WH3947> took שְׁנֵֽי־ <WH8147> that two בְנֵי־ <WH1121> of the sons יַ֠עֲקֹב <WH3290> of Jacob שִׁמְע֨וֹן <WH8095> Simeon וְלֵוִ֜י <WH3878> and Levi אֲחֵ֤י <WH251> brethren דִינָה֙ <WH1783> Dinah's אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> each man חַרְבּ֔וֹ <WH2719> his sword וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> and came עַל־ <WH5921> upon הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> upon the city בֶּ֑טַח <WH983> boldly וַיַּֽהַרְג֖וּ <WH2026> and slew כָּל־ <WH3605> every זָכָֽר׃ <WH2145> all the males

וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֲמוֹר֙ <WH2544> Hamor וְאֶת־ <WH853> שְׁכֶ֣ם <WH7927> and Shechem בְּנ֔וֹ <WH1121> his son הָרְג֖וּ <WH2026> And they slew לְפִי־ <WH6310> with the edge חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> of the sword וַיִּקְח֧וּ <WH3947> out אֶת־ <WH853> דִּינָ֛ה <WH1783> Dinah מִבֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house שְׁכֶ֖ם <WH7927> of Shechem's וַיֵּצֵֽאוּ׃ <WH3318> and went out

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The sons יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> of Jacob בָּ֚אוּ <WH935> came עַל־ <WH5921> upon הַ֣חֲלָלִ֔ים <WH2491> upon the slain וַיָּבֹ֖זּוּ <WH962> and spoiled הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> the city אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> because טִמְּא֖וּ <WH2930> because they had defiled אֲחוֹתָֽם׃ <WH269> their sister

אֶת־ <WH853> צֹאנָ֥ם <WH6629> their sheep וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּקָרָ֖ם <WH1241> and their oxen וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֲמֹרֵיהֶּ֑ם <WH2543> and their asses וְאֵ֧ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בָּעִ֛יר <WH5892> and that which [was] in the city וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בַּשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> and that which [was] in the field לָקָֽחוּ׃ <WH3947> They took

וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֵילָ֤ם <WH2428> And all their wealth וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all טַפָּם֙ <WH2945> and all their little ones וְאֶת־ <WH853> נְשֵׁיהֶ֔ם <WH802> and their wives שָׁב֖וּ <WH7617> took they captive וַיָּבֹ֑זּוּ <WH962> and spoiled וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that was בַּבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> even all that [was] in the house

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יַעֲקֹ֜ב <WH3290> And Jacob אֶל־ <WH413> to שִׁמְע֣וֹן <WH8095> to Simeon וְאֶל־ <WH413> and לֵוִי֮ <WH3878> and Levi עֲכַרְתֶּ֣ם <WH5916> Ye have troubled אֹתִי֒ <WH853> לְהַבְאִישֵׁ֙נִי֙ <WH887> me to make me to stink בְּיֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> among the inhabitants הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land בַּֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <WH3669> among the Canaanites וּבַפְּרִזִּ֑י <WH6522> and the Perizzites וַאֲנִי֙ <WH589> I מְתֵ֣י <WH4962> and I [being] few מִסְפָּ֔ר <WH4557> in number וְנֶאֶסְפ֤וּ <WH622> they shall gather themselves together עָלַי֙ <WH5921> against וְהִכּ֔וּנִי <WH5221> against me and slay me וְנִשְׁמַדְתִּ֖י <WH8045> and I shall be destroyed אֲנִ֥י <WH589> and וּבֵיתִֽי׃ <WH1004> I and my house
וַיֹּאמְר֑וּ <WH559> And they said הַכְזוֹנָ֕ה <WH2181> as with an harlot יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> Should he deal אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחוֹתֵֽנוּ׃ <WH269> with our sister פ
